title: [Self-directed] Mastery-Based Online Language Learning Module Improvement Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital learning tool usage
context.additional_context: Building personalized learning environments for general citizens to enhance language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners self-select learning materials and achieve a formative assessment pass rate of 85% or higher

Learners achieve the target language proficiency level within two retries through a data-driven feedback system.
